answerText: Thomas More[10] This other Utopian work imagined a university called Salomon's House as a part of the land of Bensalem.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 13 - Finals 1 | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer some questions about various philosophers' views of utopian society, for 10 points each: [10] This man wrote about Raphael Hythloday's journey to an island with cities ruled by Syphogranti, who in turn are ruled by Tranibori and princes. That work is entitled Utopia.
